algorithm: The new algorithm takes the logarithm of the item size and performs element-wise multiplication of the logarithm with the inverse of the rest capacities of the bins. It then takes the reciprocal of the element-wise maximum of the product and the item size, and returns the calculated scores.
code:
import numpy as np

def score(item, bins):
    log_item = np.log(item)
    inv_rest_cap = 1 / bins
    product = log_item * inv_rest_cap
    max_product = np.maximum(product, item)
    scores = 1 / max_product
    return scores
